promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a massive simple ladybug grass-type pokemon with white and green wings. It can be found in woods-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, grass or ladybug. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Verdefly, a a massive simple ladybug grass-type pokemon. It can be found in woods-like environments It has the following abilities: Firefly Scent, Follow Me. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "ladybug", "grass" or "Verdefly". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of grass-type pokemon, ladybug-like, simple, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, green and teal ambient lighting
generatedDescription: This colossal beetle dwells in lush woodlands, releasing a mesmerizing Firefly Scent to lead its timid kin safely through the shadows.
